skills.name: MUMMIFICATION
desc: • Generate up to 2 Power.
• Grants Immunity for 2 turns.
• 30% Chance to Extend Duration of Immunity to 3 turns.

skills.name: POWER SMASH
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 30% Chance to Stun a random enemy.
• Damage increases based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: POWER PUNCH
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• 20% Chance to Stun for 1 turn.
• Damage increases based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: BONE SHROUD
desc: • Grants Titan Shield for 3 turns.
• Titan Shield absorbs damage based on your MAX HP and will break if depleted.

skills.name: BURDEN OF THE DAMNED
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 30% Chance to Taunt for 1 turn.
• Stunned enemies Taunted for 2 turns.
• Damage increases based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: SACRED SANCTION
desc: • Removes Negative Effects on all allies.
• 30% Chance for each ally to gain Titan Shield for 2 turns.
• Titan Shield absorbs an amount of damage based on the target’s MAX HP.

skills.name: ELECTROCUTION
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• Deals Additional Damage to Stunned targets.
